mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(
        input: {
            title: "meowwwww"
            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}", "{{base64_photo1}}","{{base64_photo2}}"]
            mediadescription: "{{invalid_email}}"
            contenttype: image
        }
        action: POST  
    ) {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
        }
         
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(action: POST, input: { title: "text's", mediadescription: "text's", contenttype: text, media: ["{{new_bio}}"], cover: "{{base64_photo1}}" }) {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

exec: pm.test("Check advertisement posts order and type", function () {

graphql.query:
query ListAdvertisementPosts {
    listAdvertisementPosts {
        status
        counter
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            post {
                id
                contenttype
                title
                media
                cover
                mediadescription
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountviews
                amountcomments
                amountdislikes
                amounttrending
                isliked
                isviewed
                isreported
                isdisliked
                issaved
                tags
                url
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                    isfriend
                }
            }
            advertisement {
                advertisementid
                postid
                advertisementtype
                startdate
                enddate
                createdat
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                    isfriend
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
